Changelog
=========

0.2.1 (2009-08-24)

* Added fix for http://mail.zope.org/pipermail/zope3-dev/2007-April/022266.html
  because this can happen when calling macros with not enough context [spamsch]

0.2 (2009-08-24)
----------------

* Fix for missing context (TypeError exceptions) [spamsch]

0.1 (2009-08-08)
----------------

* Initial release
